snippet: Experts want to expand the search zone, but an Australian official said that would not happen unless new information about the location of the missing jet emerged....
abstract: Investigators searching for vanished Malaysia Airlines Flight 370 in remote part of southern Indian Ocean near Australia admit that they may have been looking too far south; jet disappeared in March 2014.
lead_paragraph: Experts want to expand the search zone, but an Australian official said that would not happen unless new information about the location of the missing jet emerged.

headline.main: Searchers for Malaysia Jet Say They May Have Looked Too Far South
headline.print_headline: Search Area for Malaysia Jet May Be Too Far South

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Commonwealth Scientific and Industrial Research Organization (Australia)
